TEXT.S: Zambia Itini i 15 00 S, 30 00 E, noAfilika ko Zambia. Polong no sekalay i 752,618 sq km "saka 39 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 743,398 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 9,220 sq km " Polong i 15,510,711 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 31.70 , Malo no kilakilangan a sera 66.30 , malo no roma to a sera 2 . siyoto O [[[Lusaka]] ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakamoetep 24 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Edgar Lungu, patirengan a romi'ad i 2015 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 25 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA List of current heads of state and government
